title: C10 library for shared functionality between PyTorch and Caffe2
body_html:
Stacked on #7275

Requested by @orionr

    Create c10 library for shared functionality between PyTorch and Caffe2.
        
    The c10 library is used by both PyTorch and Caffe2.  We start it off
    small and minimal, and we will suck in functionality from PyTorch/Caffe2
    that we want to use from the other side.
        
    To start, c10 contains:
        
    c10/Optional.h    An implementation of std::optional
    c10/Error.h       Error reporting functionality
    c10/Registry.h    The Caffe2 registry

body:
Stacked on https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/7275

Requested by @orionr 

```
    Create c10 library for shared functionality between PyTorch and Caffe2.
        
    The c10 library is used by both PyTorch and Caffe2.  We start it off
    small and minimal, and we will suck in functionality from PyTorch/Caffe2
    that we want to use from the other side.
        
    To start, c10 contains:
        
    c10/Optional.h    An implementation of std::optional
    c10/Error.h       Error reporting functionality
    c10/Registry.h    The Caffe2 registry
 ```
